name: Untitled Sword Game (Senhor Sérgio)
description:
This weapon is your life.

Both of you can't live apart.

They will try to ISOLATE you from your weapon...and then take your LIFE.

Defeat them and find ME.

Controls:

- W,A,S,D to move;

- F to grab your sword

- Left Mouse click to attack.

Soundtrack:
